Solid and reliable signals analysed by our professional analysts.

No Robots / No Fixed Algorithms. All our signals are analysed by our professional analysts, we do not use just indicators or robot/software signals. All instruments are analysed carefully by our analysts\' special techniques.
You get instant notifications when a signal is created or modified.
Quarterly profit tracking for better profit visualisation
Easy and user friendly interface for our clients.
Please accept Terms & Conditions to proceed.

Using the FXingSign with payment or free means that you have accepted all of the terms and conditions contained in this agreement. You should read all of these terms carefully.

 Customers who use the FXingSign accept and declare that they are 18 years old or over, they have read and understood the terms and conditions completely and they are comitted to this agreement unconditionaly.

 FXingSign reserves the copyright of the rights for changing the prices and services & products which are deem suitable at all time.

 First usage of FXingSign is free just for 30 days, for every unique user on a unique device. After 30 days of usage, FXingSign locks itself. To continue using the application, all users have to subscribe monthly. FXingSign subscriptions are renewed automatically every month, again for 30 days. Users who wish to unsubscribe, they have to cancel it from their own mobile market’s subscription list ; otherwise it will be automatically renewed. Renewed subscription fees are non-refundable, even if the subscription is canceled. Users can continue to use the application until the end of remaining days up to 30 days after cancellation. Users can not assert the reverse in any case.

 Users accept and approve in advance that they will be facing legal and criminal process if they use the source code of the application or any other attempt to obtain the source code of the application; otherwise users will be liable for every loss or demage which might rise at third-party.

 The exclusive relations with each other or with the third parties of the Users about how to use the application is their sole responsibility. FXingSign is not responsible in any way. Users will have no demands under any circumstances from FXingSign about their exclusive relations with each other and with third-parties.

 The registered or unregistered all intellectual property rights such as the title, company name, brand patents, logos, designs, information and methods located in this application are belong to the owner and operator of the application and it is the under the law protection nationally and internationally.

 The information in the application may not be reproduced, transmitted, copied, transcribed, be offered or transferred in any ways. All or a part & parts of the application can not be used at another application or web site without permission.

 FXingSign, will not disclose the personal information transmitted by users to the third-parties via the application. This personal information is intended to describe the users identification and comprises the person’s name and surname, address, phone number, mobile numbers, e-mail address of the user and any other information, it will be simply called “Confidential Information”.

 We may share your personal information we collect from you, including your name, contact details, and transactions and activities, with law enforcement, government officials, or other third parties pursuant to a subpoena, court order, or other legal process or requirement applicable to FXingSign or one of its affiliates; when we need to do so to comply with law or credit card rules; or when we believe, in our sole discretion, that the disclosure of personal information is necessary to prevent physical harm or financial loss, to report suspected illegal activity or to investigate violations of our User Agreement.

 The user right must give the correct, complete and updated registration information. Otherwise, this contract shall be considered as it has been violated and the user account can be closed without giving any notice. The user is solely responsible for passwords and account security of the application and any third party sites. Otherwise, the FXingSign is not responsible for any data loss and security breaches and hardware-device loss or damages which might occur.

 If one of the terms of this contract becomes completely or partially invalid, the lagging of the contract continues to protect the validity of the contract.

 FXingSign will not commit any lower limit or upper limit for the analysis and estimates on the basis of units.

 This application has been developed in order to inform the forex traders.

 “Account management” and “investment consultancy” are not in question through the application. “Investment consulting” is only offered around with the investment advisory contract signed between brokerage firms, portfolio management companies, the bank does not accept deposits and the customer. It is the customer’s responsibilty to evaluate the information contained here in and make the decision for the investment who agree to signed the contact exclusively. The views and opinions taken here may not be appropriate for your financial situation and risk and return preferences. Therefore, your investment decision only based on the information contained at the application will not have any obligation to FXingSign. User knows that this regulation is the main condition of this agreement and knows that the main condition to use the application and User accepts and declares unconditionally.

 In highly leveraged markets such as forex stop loss and take profit use is important. In addition to this, risking 2-3% of the capital is important in terms of making money. The users who accepted the contract to fulfill these requirements is their own responsibility and will not bear any liability to FXingSign. Users know that this is the main condition of this agreement and the application and accept and declare it unconditionally.

 FXingSign never gives any warranty for the analysis and the notifications given at any time. The notifications shared here are completely under the foresight. Taken the notifications sent to the customers into account or not, sharing the notifications with third parties is the sole responsibility of the customers.

 FXingSign can change the offered services and partially or completely change the terms of this contract at any time .It is the user’s responsibility to monitor changes. While users continue to benefit from the services they deemed to have accepted these changes. Customers can not assert the reverse in any case.
